segments.source_content:
---
title: Authentication
sidebar_label: Authentication
sidebar_position: 78
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Organisations within Flagsmith can be locked to a single authentication method if required, meaning that accounts can
neither be created or logged into with anything other than the method specified.

This can be configured at an Organisation level by a Super-Administrator. Please get in touch if you need help with
this.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

Flagsmith中的组织可按需锁定为单一认证方式，这意味着账户只能通过指定方式创建或登录。

此配置需由超级管理员在组织层级完成。如需协助，请随时联系我们。

:::

segments.source_content: As well as Email/Password and OAuth2 via Google or Github, we also provide the following methods of authentication.

translations.zh-CN: 除邮箱/密码及通过Google或Github的OAuth2认证外，我们还提供以下认证方式。

segments.source_content: ## SAML - SaaS

translations.zh-CN: ## SAML - SaaS版

segments.source_content:
The Flagsmith platform can be configured for a given organisation to use SAML authentication. To configure SAML login
for your organisation please get in touch with us directly to help set it up.

translations.zh-CN: 可为指定组织配置Flagsmith平台使用SAML认证。如需为您的组织设置SAML登录，请直接联系我们协助完成配置。

segments.source_content: The steps we need to go through are something like:

translations.zh-CN: 配置流程大致如下：

segments.source_content:
1. You contact us to enable SAML for your organisation.
2. We create an XML file and provide it to you along with your SAML organisation name.
3. You supply the XML to your SAML IDP and receive some XML in return. You might need to apply some
   [attribute mappings](#attribute-mapping-information).
4. You send us this XML and we add it to Flagsmith.
5. You log in by visiting https://app.flagsmith.com/login clicking on "Single Sign On" and entering your SAML
   organisation name from step 2.

translations.zh-CN:
1. 您联系我们为组织启用SAML功能
2. 我们生成XML文件并提供SAML组织名称
3. 您将该XML提供给SAML身份提供商(IDP)，并接收返回的XML（可能需要配置[属性映射](#attribute-mapping-information)）
4. 您发回该XML，我们将其添加至Flagsmith系统
5. 用户访问https://app.flagsmith.com/login，点击"单点登录"并输入第2步获取的SAML组织名称即可登录

segments.source_content:
Note that users authenticated via SAML can only belong to one organisation, the one that the SAML configuration is tied
to.

translations.zh-CN: 请注意：通过SAML认证的用户仅能属于与其SAML配置绑定的单一组织。

segments.source_content:
To set up SAML authentication, we will provide you with a unique name for your SAML organisation that you must then
enter when prompted by the 'Single Sign on' dialog. We will also provide you with our Service Provider metadata and
expect your IdP metadata in return.

translations.zh-CN: 设置SAML认证时，我们将为您提供唯一的SAML组织名称（需在"单点登录"对话框中输入），同时提供我们的服务提供商元数据，并需要您返回IDP元数据。

segments.source_content: ## SAML - Enterprise On-premise

translations.zh-CN: ## SAML - 企业本地部署版

segments.source_content:
:::tip

SAML authentication is only available as part of our Enterprise Plans. Please
[get in touch](https://flagsmith.com/contact-us/) if this is something you are interested in!

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

SAML认证仅在企业版计划中提供。如有需求，请[联系我们](https://flagsmith.com/contact-us/)！

:::

segments.source_content:
To allow an Organisation on the Flagsmith platform to login using SAML authentication, you'll need to access the admin
interface. Instructions on how to access the admin interface can be found
[here](https://docs.flagsmith.com/deployment/configuration/django-admin).

translations.zh-CN: 要为Flagsmith平台上的组织启用SAML登录，需访问管理员界面。访问方法详见[此文档](https://docs.flagsmith.com/deployment/configuration/django-admin)。

segments.source_content:
Once you've logged into the django admin interface, you'll need to click on the 'Saml Configurations' option in the menu
on the left. From here, you should see a list of existing SAML configuration entities. To create a new one, click on the
'ADD SAML CONFIGURATION' button in the top right corner of the screen.

translations.zh-CN: 登录Django管理员界面后，点击左侧菜单中的'Saml Configurations'选项。在现有SAML配置列表页面，点击右上角的'ADD SAML CONFIGURATION'按钮创建新配置。

segments.source_content: You should see a screen similar to the following.

translations.zh-CN: 您将看到类似下图的界面：

segments.source_content: ![SAML Auth Setup](/img/saml-auth-setup.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![SAML认证设置](/img/saml-auth-setup.png)

segments.source_content:
From the drop down next to **Organisation**, select the organisation in the Flagsmith platform that you want to
configure for SAML authentication.

translations.zh-CN: 在**Organisation**下拉菜单中选择需要配置SAML认证的Flagsmith平台组织。

segments.source_content:
Next to **Organisation name**, add a name without any spaces that identifies the organisation uniquely for the
installation of Flagsmith you're working on. This is what users will provide when authenticating with SAML so that the
platform knows where to redirect them.

translations.zh-CN: 在**Organisation name**字段输入不含空格的唯一组织标识名称。用户将通过该名称进行SAML认证以确定重定向目标。

segments.source_content:
Next to **Frontend url**, add in the URL at which your Frontend application is running. This is where users will be
redirected to on a successful SAML authentication.

translations.zh-CN: 在**Frontend url**字段填入您前端应用的运行URL，用户SAML认证成功后将被重定向至此地址。

segments.source_content: For now, we'll leave **Idp metadata xml** empty.

translations.zh-CN: 暂时保持**Idp metadata xml**字段为空。

segments.source_content:
If you require the ability to initiate authentication requests from your IdP (IdP initiated), you'll need to check the
box next to **Allow IdP-initiated (unsolicited) login**.

translations.zh-CN: 如需从IDP发起认证请求（IDP初始化登录），请勾选**Allow IdP-initiated (unsolicited) login**选项。

segments.source_content: Once you've completed these fields, hit the **Save** button to create the SAML configuration.

translations.zh-CN: 完成上述字段填写后，点击**Save**按钮创建SAML配置。

segments.source_content:
Now, we need to grab the Flagsmith service provider metadata to configure the integration on your IDP. To do this, open
a new browser tab and head to `https://<your Flagsmith API>/api/v1/auth/saml/<organisation_name>/metadata/` where
`<organisation_name>` is the name you provided above. From here, copy and paste what you see in the web page into a new
text file and save that file as `flagsmith-sp-metadata.xml` or similar.

translations.zh-CN: 现在我们需要获取Flagsmith的服务提供者元数据，以便在您的身份提供商(IDP)上配置集成。请打开新浏览器标签页，访问`https://<您的Flagsmith API地址>/api/v1/auth/saml/<组织名称>/metadata/`，其中`<组织名称>`是您之前提供的名称。将网页显示的内容复制粘贴到新建的文本文件中，保存为`flagsmith-sp-metadata.xml`或类似名称。

segments.source_content:
Note: do not use 'save page as' from your browser as this will likely result in the metadata being incorrect and the
integration will not work.

translations.zh-CN: 注意：不要使用浏览器的"另存为"功能，这可能导致元数据不正确，致使集成失效。

segments.source_content:
Now you can use this XML metadata to create the integration on your IDP. Once created on the IDP, you can add the IDP
metadata into the **Idp metadata xml** field that we left blank earlier.

translations.zh-CN: 现在您可以使用此XML元数据在IDP上创建集成。在IDP端配置完成后，将IDP的元数据填入之前留空的**Idp metadata xml**字段。

segments.source_content: ## Attribute Mapping information

translations.zh-CN: ## 属性映射信息

segments.source_content:
To uniquely identify users, we attempt to retrieve a unique identifier from either the `subject-id` or `uid` claim, or
we use the content of the `NameID` attribute.

translations.zh-CN: 为唯一识别用户，我们会尝试从`subject-id`或`uid`声明中获取唯一标识符，或使用`NameID`属性的内容。

segments.source_content: We also map the following Flagsmith user attributes to the following claims in the SAML response.

translations.zh-CN: 我们还将以下Flagsmith用户属性映射到SAML响应中的对应声明：

segments.source_content:
| Flagsmith Attribute | IdP claims                                             |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| `email`             | `mail`, `email` or `emailAddress`                      |
| `first_name`        | `gn`, `givenName` or (the first part of) `displayName` |
| `last_name`         | `sn`, `surname` or (the second part of) `displayName`  |

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f6bd7ec7

segments.source_content: Here's an example configuration from Google's SAML app creation flow.

translations.zh-CN: 以下是Google SAML应用创建流程的配置示例：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_440823bd

segments.source_content: ## SAML Group Sync

translations.zh-CN: ## SAML群组同步

segments.source_content: You can configure Flagsmith to add or remove a user from a group (on login) based on your SAML response.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以配置Flagsmith，根据SAML响应在用户登录时将其添加或移出群组。

segments.source_content:
E.g: let's assume you have a group named `team` in your system and whenever a user logs in into Flagsmith you want
either that user to be added (if the group is part of relevant SAML attribute, but the user is not already part of the
group) to the equivalent Flagsmith group or be removed (if the group is not part of the relevant SAML attribute, but the
user is part of the group) from it.

translations.zh-CN: 例如：假设您的系统中存在名为`team`的群组，当用户登录Flagsmith时，若该群组存在于相关SAML属性中（但用户尚未加入），则将其添加至对应的Flagsmith群组；若群组不存在于SAML属性中（但用户已加入），则将其移出。

segments.source_content: ### Configuration

translations.zh-CN: ### 配置方法

segments.source_content:
To configure this, you need to create an equivalent group in Flagsmith using the SAML name of the group as the External
ID. e.g: if your SAML attribute looks like the below xml snippet (and you want the `team` group to be synced):

translations.zh-CN: 需在Flagsmith中创建对应群组，并使用SAML群组名称作为外部ID。例如：若您的SAML属性如下方XML片段所示（且需同步`team`群组）：

segments.source_content:
```xml
<saml2:Attribute Name="groups">
    <saml2:AttributeValue
        xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="xs:anyType">team
    </saml2:AttributeValue>
    <saml2:AttributeValue
        xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="xs:anyType">for_saml_group_test
    </saml2:AttributeValue>
</saml2:Attribute>
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1a63b635

segments.source_content: Then you need to create an equivalent group in the Flagsmith that will look like this:

translations.zh-CN: 则需在Flagsmith中创建如下对应群组：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_88cb26ec

segments.source_content: ## OAuth

translations.zh-CN: ## OAuth认证

segments.source_content: ### Google

translations.zh-CN: ### Google

segments.source_content: To configure OAuth for Google:

translations.zh-CN: 配置Google OAuth的步骤：

segments.source_content:
- [Setting up OAuth 2.0](https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/6158849?hl=en)
- Create the Flagsmith on Flagsmith flag as it shows [here](/deployment/overview#oauth_google).

translations.zh-CN:
- [设置OAuth 2.0](https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/6158849?hl=en)
- 按[此处](/deployment/overview#oauth_google)说明创建Flagsmith功能开关

segments.source_content: ### Github

translations.zh-CN: ### Github

segments.source_content:
As a pre-requisite for this configuration make sure to have
[Flagsmith on Flagsmith](/deployment/overview#running-flagsmith-on-flagsmith) set up.

translations.zh-CN: 配置前提：确保已设置[Flagsmith自托管实例](/deployment/overview#running-flagsmith-on-flagsmith)

segments.source_content: Configure the following environment variables:

translations.zh-CN: 需配置以下环境变量：

segments.source_content:
- `GITHUB_CLIENT_ID`
- `GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET`

translations.zh-CN:
- `GITHUB_CLIENT_ID`
- `GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET`

segments.source_content: To configure OAuth for Github:

translations.zh-CN: 配置Github OAuth的步骤：

segments.source_content:
- [Create an OAuth Github application](https://docs.github.com/en/developers/apps/building-oauth-apps/creating-an-oauth-app)
- For the Authorization callback URL use: `https://<your flagsmith domain name>/oauth/github`
- Create the Flagsmith on Flagsmith flag as it shows [here](/deployment/overview#oauth_github).

translations.zh-CN:
- [创建OAuth Github应用](https://docs.github.com/en/developers/apps/building-oauth-apps/creating-an-oauth-app)
- 回调URL填写：`https://<您的Flagsmith域名>/oauth/github`
- 按[此处](/deployment/overview#oauth_github)说明创建Flagsmith功能开关

segments.source_content: Now you would be able to see the GitHub SSO option.

translations.zh-CN: 完成后即可看到GitHub单点登录选项。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5c5fbd5d

segments.source_content: ## LDAP

translations.zh-CN: ## LDAP认证

segments.source_content:
LDAP Authentication is available in our [Enterprise Edition](/deployment/configuration/enterprise-edition.md). Please
contact us if this is of interest. We also support sync-ing of LDAP groups into
[Flagsmith RBAC groups](/advanced-use/permissions.md#groups)).

translations.zh-CN: LDAP认证功能仅限[企业版](/deployment/configuration/enterprise-edition.md)。如有需求请联系我们。我们还支持将LDAP群组同步至[Flagsmith RBAC群组](/advanced-use/permissions.md#groups)。

segments.source_content: ## AD FS

translations.zh-CN: ## AD FS

segments.source_content:
Active Directory Federation Services Authentication is available in our
[Enterprise Edition](/deployment/configuration/enterprise-edition.md).

translations.zh-CN: Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 可在我们的[企业版](/deployment/configuration/enterprise-edition.md)中使用。

segments.source_content: ## Okta

translations.zh-CN: ## Okta

segments.source_content: Okta Integration is available in our [Enterprise Edition](/deployment/configuration/enterprise-edition.md).

translations.zh-CN: Okta 集成可在我们的[企业版](/deployment/configuration/enterprise-edition.md)中使用。
